channel.title: Getting the key pressed
channel.description:
Hello I am wondering how i can check what key was pressed?
for example if a user hits 'v', then I could set that character to a variable, int or char, it wouldn't matter... I just want to know how to read in one letter
thanks
EDIT:
program Test; begin repeat writeln('hi'); until(isKeyDown('v')); end. nvm got it :P

item.title: Getting the key pressed
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

You got it?

If you do get stuck though, ill help.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting the key pressed
item.dc:creator: @yomama yomama`
item.description:
@yomama wrote:

Hello I am wondering how i can check what key was pressed?

for example if a user hits ‘v’, then I could set that character to a variable, int or char, it wouldn’t matter… I just want to know how to read in one letter

thanks

EDIT:

program Test;
begin
repeat
writeln(‘hi’);
until(isKeyDown(‘v’));
end.
nvm got it

Read full topic
